title: A few key concepts for surviving Bronze

embed.description: Find out if team players win more games, earn more gold and carry their teams to victory. Click here to sign up and play League of Legends: http://bit.ly/17HgbZ8

body:
We all know league is a team based game, and unfortunately there is very little teamwork present in the community. Especially when you're stuck in the hell that is Bronze. 

With that in mind, i've made a list of simple concepts to help people like me get some better games and more wins!

Teamwork OP: 
There's a nifty little video that explains this one!

KS= Kill secured: 
Don't ever be upset that your team got a kill. It makes no sense.

Objectives win games:
 Prioritize Towers, Inhibs, drag, baron, over chasing down low champs. Speaking of which...

Chase rhymes with bait: 
75% of chases end up in baits.  Even if they're low.That's what global ults are for. SUPA MEGA DEATH ROCKET!!

Communication is key: 
Use that time in the champ select to learn your team. Don't be afraid to ping during games, especially if you're bot lane.

Don't be toxic: 
Everyone has bad games. don't call someone out or make them feel like shit because they happen to be having one. We've all been the dead weight in a game before. Support your teammates. 

It's not all about you!
No matter how well you do in lane, or mow many kills you get, or how much you think you can carry, remember that the team wins together and looses together.
